data.actual_result: Shows that you're still deafend, but not muted (so you are able to talk) System Settings: Android 6.0.1
data.short_description: Deafen then undefen using the button in the Discord notification in the notifications dropdown menu doesn't show that you're undefend, but you can hear other people
data.steps_to_repro: - Join voice chat - Deafen - Undeafen using the Discord notification in the notifications dropdown - Get someone to sing you a song (or talk)
